messageBody:
On 7/14/05, Andrew McDonagh <andrew.mcdonagh@...> wrote:
> That certain is a good timer abstraction & implementation, but it is not
> what we needed.
> We needed the current date & Time, not a timed period.

So something like:

interface Clock {
Date getCurrentDate()
}

?

My point was not to say what abstraction needs to be used, but simply
that the use of an abstraction can do double-duty. Both simplifying
code and also providing testability.
